Notes.Text:
This update for vte fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-37535: Fixed a bug that allowed an attacker to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a window resize escape. (bsc#1226134)

Vulnerabilities.Description: GNOME VTE before 0.76.3 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a window resize escape sequence, a related issue to CVE-2000-0476.
